TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>类用于提供到的事件值<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>事件并使您能够指定当前请求的自定义 Windows 标识。 您可以访问<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>的事件<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>类通过指定一个名为子例程**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。
<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>构造<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>对象使用当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>并将其传递给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。
可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>的属性<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>对象提供给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件以便设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>属性期间**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，<xref:System.Guid>使用。
**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**仅当匿名标识， <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件以便设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>构造<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>对象使用当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。 然后将其传递<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>对象传递给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AnonymousID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AnonymousID : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the anonymous identifier for the user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>属性设置为在过程的自定义值的匿名标识符**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>属性期间**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，<xref:System.Guid>使用。
**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**仅当匿名标识， <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件以便设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As HttpContext
public: property System::Web::HttpContext ^ Context { System::Web::HttpContext ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the object for the current HTTP request.
Docs.value: 当前 HTTP 请求的 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>提供对访问<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>当前请求的对象。
